EmailTemplate.name: REBAM BSI - Final Attempt
EmailTemplate.subject: LegalZoom - Real Estate Business Account Manager
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom for your real estate business needs. We have attempted to contact you by phone regarding several upcoming matters for your LLC. We have so far been unsuccessful in speaking with you, but would like to assure you that we are here to assist you. LegalZoom has assisted in forming and maintaining thousands of real estate businesses, and we can help you ensure that your business stays in compliance with critical state and local matters.
Please contact me upon receiving this email so that I can put you in contact with your Account Manager to assist you with these matters. Thank you for choosing LegalZoom as your premiere business resource, and we look forward to assisting you in growing your business.
Best regards,
{!User.FirstName} (800) 773-0888 x{!User.Extension} www.legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
